name: The Apothecary (KevZ3742)
description:
Created for Mini Jame Gam #8 in 2 days

Controls:
WASD - Move
LMB - Damage Potion
1 - Heal Potion
2 - Rage Potion
3 - Stealth Potion(Work in Progress)
4 - Speed Potion
E - Interact

Tips:
- Press E on grass and bushes to collect them.
- Press E to us Cauldron.
- Conserve your damage potions early. You can out run every mob except Wisp.
- Get Rage Potions, They are op.
